ygData.subject: Re: Anyone play PS2 EQ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I gave up playing PC EQ along time ago. I miss somethings about that version, but have also fallen in love with some of the features that the PS2 version
ygData.messageBody:
Well I gave up playing PC EQ along time ago. I miss somethings about
that version, but have also fallen in love with some of the features
that the PS2 version offers. Slight differences, and some major ones,
but oh well. :)

I am actually just waiting for the new game by Varient, Star Wars
Galaxies. Supposedly it will fix everything crappy about EQ, and be
one of the best gam,es for online. I cant wait to bash heads with my
female wookie. LOL

Maybe when i get my new PC I will come back and play the PC version
of EQ again. I loved my necromancer, and my druid there. I was
untouchable! HEHE
